node.title: Anatomy of Support Vector Machines : Hard margin and Dual formulation
node.excerpt: Support Vector machines are one of the most intriguing concept in whole of machine learning. When I was learning about it, I had so many questions and the content on the internet is either incomplete or incorrect. In this series of articles, I tried to answer all the questions that comes to our mind and those that will help you understand the concept better.
